name: Combat Character
description:
Game Instructions:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move. (Beware... the game is designed where if you are blocked off, you won't be able to turn!)
  • Space to shoot.
  • Escape to quit.
  • F1 to reset all saved scores.

Note: For the last two bullet points, you must be on the title screen!

Further Information:

Hi! Hope you enjoy the game :)

If you like what I've put out so far or want to see any other projects I create in the future, you can check out my content here...
